ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.activities
Class ViewAudioActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.activities.ViewAudioActivity

public class ViewAudioActivity
extends Activity

Handles the viewing and adding of Audio to each Task. Audio files can be added through the "Add Audio" button. Audio files can be played back by pressing them (ListView --> listener to open MediaPlayer).

Author:
Ian Watts
